quote: When the time is right, you will find your space in universal design. That space is the reality of our consciousness; rest is layers upon layers of memories, desires, and insecurities of mind.
quote_letters: WHEN THE TIME IS RIGHT YOU WILL FIND YOUR SPACE IN UNIVERSAL DESIGN THAT SPACE IS THE REALITY OF OUR CONSCIOUSNESS REST IS LAYERS UPON LAYERS OF MEMORIES DESIRES AND INSECURITIES OF MIND
